message: Let's split it evenly. This way we both get a fair share.
I'll take the majority, you get a small share.
Equal division seems fair to me. It's better than risking getting less in the next rounds.
I'll take a bigger share, you get a tiny share, but it's better than getting nothing after 3 rounds.
